string.name: santaDashboard
string.translation_description: A grouping of Santa's status on a dashboard

resources.string: แผงควบคุมของซานต้า

string.name: current_location
string.translation_description: Where is Santa now. Label in all capital letters.

resources.string: ตำแหน่งปัจจุบัน

string.name: presents_delivered
string.translation_description: How many presents has Santa delivered. Label in all capital letters.

resources.string: ของขวัญที่ส่งแล้ว

string.name: santa_status
string.translation_description: What's Santa saying. Label in all capital letters.

resources.string: สถานะของซานต้า

string.name: arriving_in
string.translation_description: How much longer until Santa arrives at the next stop.Label in all capital letters.

resources.string: จะถึงภายใน

string.name: departing_in
string.translation_description: How much longer until Santa departs current location. Label in all capital letters.

resources.string: จะออกภายใน

string.name: localtime
string.translation_description: Santa has arrived at a particular destination. Label in all capital letters.

resources.string: ถึงแล้วที่

string.name: population
string.translation_description: The population of a location that Santa is visiting. Label in all capital letters.

resources.string: จำนวนประชากร

string.name: next_destination
string.translation_description: What is Santa's next stop. Label in all capital letters.

resources.string: จุดหมายต่อไป

string.name: arriving_at
string.translation_description: Which destination is Santa arriving at. Label in all capital letters.

resources.string: จะมาถึงที่

string.name: arrived_at
string.translation_description: Which destination did Santa arrive at. Label in all capital letters.

resources.string: ถึงแล้วที่

string.name: in_transit
string.translation_description: Santa is traveling to the next stop.

resources.string: กำลังเดินทาง

string.name: touch_for_santa_cam
string.translation_description: A button that enables Santa Cam - an automated stylised camera that tracks Santa

resources.string: กลับไปที่กล้องซานต้า

string.name: lost_contact_with_santa
string.translation_description: Having trouble communicating with Santa (networking issue)

resources.string: ขาดการติดต่อกับซานต้า

string.name: notification_nearby
string.translation_description: Santa is close to your location

resources.string: ซานต้าอยู่ใกล้ๆ นี่เอง

string.name: notification_takeoff
string.translation_description: Santa's journey has begun, he is now delivering presents

resources.string: ซานต้าได้ออกเดินทางไปแล้ว!

string.name: notification_unlock_video
string.translation_description: A new video has been unlocked in the app leading up to Chrstimas

resources.string: มีวิดีโอใหม่ให้ชมแล้ว

string.name: notification_unlock_game
string.translation_description: A new game has been unlocked in the app leading up to Chrstimas

resources.string: มีเกมใหม่ให้เล่นแล้ว

string.name: santa_arrives_in_your_area_in
string.translation_description: Heading. Followed by a time until he arrives users location.

resources.string: ซานต้าจะมาถึงพื้นที่ของคุณใน

string.name: santa_is_approximately
string.translation_description: Followed by a distance between Santa and user location.

resources.string: ซานต้าอยู่ห่างออกไปประมาณ

string.name: distance_km_away
string.translation_description: Distance between Santa and the user current location. Kilometer in short. The first argument is a number. The second may be a number in miles depending on locale.

string.name: distance_optional_miles
string.translation_description: Distance converted as miles. May not be shown in some locales.

string.name: distance_mi_away
string.translation_description: Distance between Santa and the user current location. Mile in short.

resources.string: %1$,d ไมล์

string.name: did_you_know
string.translation_description: Heading for trivia facts.

resources.string: คุณรู้ไหม

string.name: watch_movie
string.translation_description: Title for videos

resources.string: ดูวิดีโอ

string.name: santa_update
string.translation_description: Heading for Status messages from Santa

resources.string: อัปเดตจากซานต้า

string.name: elapsed_time
string.translation_description: Heading for elapsed time

resources.string: เวลาที่ผ่านไป

string.name: wikipedia
string.translation_description: Label for button to show a wikipedia page.

resources.string: วิกิพีเดีย

string.name: arrival
string.translation_description: Label for the time Santa arriving at a city

resources.string: ซานต้ามาถึง

string.name: weather
string.translation_description: Label for the weather (temperature) of a city

resources.string: สภาพอากาศ

string.name: weather_format
string.translation_description: Temperature expression, like 23 C / 73 F

string.name: did_you_know_attribution
string.translation_description: Attribution of 'Did you know' facts to the 'National Geographic Bee'

resources.string: ข้อเท็จจริงเกี่ยวกับโลกจาก National Geographic Bee

string.name: photo
string.translation_description: Label for button to show a photo of a place.

resources.string: รูปภาพ

string.name: photos
string.translation_description: Label for button to show photos (plural) of a place.

resources.string: รูปภาพ

string.name: street_view
string.translation_description: Label for button to show Street View

resources.string: สตรีทวิว

string.name: back_to_santa_cam
string.translation_description: Label for button to go back to the Santa cam mode.

resources.string: กลับไปที่กล้องซานต้า

string.name: update_from_santa
string.translation_description: Content description for icon that indicates that the information is an update from Santa about his locations and such

resources.string: อัปเดตจากซานต้า

string.name: trivia_from_santa
string.translation_description: Content description for icon that indicates that the information is a trivia.

resources.string: เกร็ดข้อมูลจากซานต้า

string.name: photo_from_santa
string.translation_description: Content description for icon that indicates that the information is about a photo

resources.string: รูปภาพจากซานต้า

string.name: video_from_santa
string.translation_description: Content description for icon that indicates that the information is about a video

resources.string: วิดีโอจากซานต้า

string.name: show_history
string.translation_description: Label for button to show card history.

resources.string: แสดงประวัติ

string.name: see_best_moments
string.translation_description: Label for card to show history.

resources.string: ดูช่วงเวลาน่าประทับใจทั้งหมดในการเดินทางของซานต้า

string.name: return_to_map
string.translation_description: Label for button to go back to tracker from full screen streetview/video/photo

resources.string: กลับไปที่แผนที่

string.name: santa_is_now_arriving_in_x
string.translation_description: Label for the next place Santa is visiting

resources.string: ซานต้ากำลังจะถึง %s แล้ว

string.name: santa_has_handed_out_x_presents
string.translation_description: Label for the number of presents Santa has delivered so far

resources.string: ซานต้าแจกของขวัญไปแล้ว %s ชิ้น

string.name: new_update_from_santa
string.translation_description: Label for icon that indicates an update from Santa

resources.string: อัปเดตใหม่จากซานต้า

string.name: new_trivia_from_santa
string.translation_description: Label for icon that indicates a trivia from Santa

resources.string: เกร็ดข้อมูลใหม่จากซานต้า

string.name: new_video_from_santa
string.translation_description: Label for icon that indicates a video from Santa

resources.string: วิดีโอใหม่จากซานต้า
